comp3111.webscraper

Class WebScraper

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp3111.webscraper.WebScraper

  • public class WebScraper
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a web scraper that extract item listing data from Craigslist and DCFever. After it is constructed, you can call the method scrape with a keyword, the client will query for related secondhand listings on the sites and return a list of Item objects.

        Parse HTML of Craigslist result page into list of Item objects
        Parameters:
        page - - HTML page of search result
        Returns:
        List of Items found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if exception occurred

      • scrape

        public java.util.List<Item> scrape(java.lang.String keyword)
        Scrape web content from Craigslist and DCFever. All available pages will be downloaded and parsed.
        Parameters:
        keyword - - the keyword for searching
        Returns:
        A list of Item that was found. An empty size list is returned if nothing is found. Null if any exception occurred (e.g. no connectivity)
